title: Focusing on The Good in the Early Years
itunes:author: Guests: Bill & Pam Farrel
itunes:summary:
Starting your marriage off well won't happen by accident. To have a thriving relationship, it's important to develop good habits early on. To help couples start well, John, Greg and Erin weigh in with some practical ideas for focusing on the best aspects of your spouse. Featuring Bill and Pam Farrel.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Get Bill and Pam Farrel's book "The First Five Years" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-01?refcd=1324803

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/focusing-on-the-good-in-the-early-years/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/thriving-in-the-early-years-of-marriage-digital-product?refcd=1324803

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
